programme.title: BENTO EXPO-BENTO EXPO
programme.desc: Today: bentos with Marc and special guest Nozaki Hiromitsu, a legendary chef of Japanese cuisine. Their bentos feature beef shigure-ni. From Kagoshima, a sweet potato tempura bento.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life-Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: A beloved stuffed animal can be irreplicable. Hakozaki Natsumi carefully restores these members of the family sent in by people from around the world at her stuffed animal hospital.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE-NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPANs flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan-Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: David Bull came to Japan to master the art of woodblock printing. He learned valuable lessons about Japanese culture and that there is more to the works of art than the paper they are printed on.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: A Spring Party-Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: A Spring Party
programme.desc: We visit one of the most famous cherry blossom spots in Edo. Flower viewing parties were for eating, drinking and making merry. It was also an opportunity for young men and women to mingle.

programme.title: Time-lapse Japan-Time-lapse Japan
programme.desc: The Jomon period dates roughly from 13,000 to 300 BC. We examine various aspects of Jomon society, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: Lacquer.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini-Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: In Japan, sweet potatoes are often baked or turned into sweets. But they can also be used to generate electricity or protect from heat. We introduce the diverse ways in which they are used and sold.

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo-Trails to Oishii Tokyo
programme.desc: Enoki are the most produced mushroom in Japan. The thin, white mushrooms are a staple ingredient in hot pot dishes. Check out amazing cultivation methods and feast your eyes on some unique recipes.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE-NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPANs flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Discharged by Death-Discharged by Death
programme.desc: Exclusive video, sound recordings, and patient records from a psychiatric hospital reveal rampant abuse and illegal restraints. Over a 10-year period, 78% of 1498 patients were discharged by death.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE-NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPANs flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Hiroshige Blue-Hiroshige Blue
programme.desc: Hiroshiges struggles to become a successful ukiyo-e artist is supported by his devoted wife. Using a paint called Berlin blue, he pursues his passion for painting, but success comes at a price. Ep.3

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan-MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: At Hibuse Matsuri, the Fire Prevention Festival, men douse buildings in water as a prayer for protection from fire. At this event held in January, bonfires and sake help to keep people warm.

programme.title: Nuns Cookbook-Nuns Cookbook
programme.desc: Furofuki daikon with two sauces. Both sauces use a fresh white miso base, but one is made with chopped butterbur and the other with yuzu citrus. Serve with boiled daikon.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE-NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPANs flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Train Cruise-Train Cruise
programme.desc: Criss-cross Japan by rail. Enjoy an amazing diversity of nature and scenery across the four seasons, exploring both well-known and hidden Japan.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini-Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at karakuri ningyo, or mechanical dolls. Their clever mechanisms have been entertaining the public for centuries.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE-NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPANs flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Never Too Old to Work-Never Too Old to Work
programme.desc: A Tokyo shutter manufacturer employs the elderly, which make up 30% of its staff. We take a closer look at this workplace where seniors thrive.

programme.title: Rockie and Her Friends-Rockie and Her Friends
programme.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

programme.title: TAKE TECH-TAKE TECH
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE-NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPANs flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Time and Tide-Time and Tide
programme.desc: Time and Tide transcends time to detail extraordinary historical events in Japan and the world. Join NHK WORLD-JAPAN on a journey that reveals the truth behind some of the turning points of the past.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY-CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini-Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: Discover the unique, traditional method of roof thatching that uses Hinoki cypress bark.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE-NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPANs flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japans Top Inventions-Japans Top Inventions
programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time: cockroach traps residential maps.

programme.title: BOSAI: Soil Liquefaction-BOSAI: Soil Liquefaction
programme.desc: When a major earthquake hits, the ground can turn into muddy water. This is called liquefaction. Buildings may sink or tilt and become uninhabitable. Find out the mechanisms and how to prevent it.

programme.title: PythagoraSwitch mini-PythagoraSwitch mini
programme.desc: There are various interesting laws and rules and philosophies hidden in our daily lives. This program introduces children to them and how to think.

programme.desc: Kyoto City University of Arts, founded in 1880, has produced leading painters in the art world. Its policy emphasizes Shasei: painting from life through intensive observation.
